datasetStructure: One record per drug accountability finding per subject

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study within the submission.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Unique subject identifier within the submission.

datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DASEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DAGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external identifier such as label number.
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: DAREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Examples: Line number on the Drug Accountability page, drug label code.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DASPID

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DATESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short character value for DATEST used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical format to a horizontal format. The short value can be up to 8 characters and cannot begin with a number or contain characters other than letters, numbers or underscores. Example: DISPAMT, RETAMT.
datasetVariables.label: Short Name of Accountability Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DATESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DATEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name, corresponding to the topic variable, of the test or examination used to obtain the drug accountability assessment. The value in DATEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Example: Dispensed Amount, Returned Amount.
datasetVariables.label: Name of Accountability Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DATEST

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DACAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related records. Examples: STUDY MEDICATION, RESCUE MEDICATION.
datasetVariables.label: Category of Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DACAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a further categorization level for a group of related records.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory of Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DASCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the Drug Accountability assessment as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Assessment Result in Original Units
datasetVariables.name: DAORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAORRESU

datasetVariables.description: Unit for DAORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Original Units
datasetVariables.name: DAORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all Drug Accountability assessments, copied or derived from DAORRES in a standard format or in standard units. DASTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in DASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Assessment Result in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from DASTRESC. DASTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized units used for DASTRESC and DASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Assessment Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a drug accountability assessment was not done. Should be null or have a value of NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: DASTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAREASND

datasetVariables.description: Reason not done. Used in conjunction with DASTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Performed
datasetVariables.name: DAREASND

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: 1. Clinical encounter number. 2. Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: 1. Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter 2. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of the visit based upon RFSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Visit
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DADTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DADY

datasetVariables.description: 1. Study day of drug accountability assessment, measured as integer days. 2. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Accountability Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DADY

description: An events domain that contains the accountability of study drug, such as information on the receipt, dispensing, return, and packaging. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49578, 2018-06-29)
label: Drug Accountability
name: DA
